name: Don't protest me!
description:
[READ THIS IF YOU HAVE SOUND STUTTERS WHILE PLAYING IN THE BROWSER]

If you encounter sound stutters while using Chrome, please download one of desktop executables in the "Downloads" section

Welcome to the regime! You are a dictator struggling to stay in power as long as possible. Do whatever it takes to keep yourself secure in top; Don’t let those protests take control over you and let them know that they actually love you!

Use all kinds of dictatorship tools to fight protesters. Gain some new skills, earn some money for the budget, easy!

But be careful, if protests go too far or your budget come to zero, you will lose.

Controls: mouse only
